title: Floods
question: The Philippine Atmospheric, Geophysical and Astronomical Services Administration (PAGASA) monitors floods in Metro Manila. PAGASA classifies flood warnings into 4 categories in increasing levels of urgency - normal, alert, alarm and critical. There are multiple stations throughout Metro Manila to track water levels and issue flood warnings if necessary. On [date], will there be at least one station whose flood warning is at a critical level?

title: Electric Vehicles
question: Will the local interest in the search term 'electric vehicles' remain above 50 between 0900 to 1700 hours on [date]? (N.B. The numbers on “Google Trends” represent search interest relative to the highest point on the chart for a given region and time. A value of 100 reflects the peak popularity for a term. A value of 50 means that the term is half as popular. A score of 0 means there was not enough data for this term.)
